sub_title: Head of Service Operations Europe bij Brink's Solutions
summary:
Versatile, results-driven and highly motivated Leader with 12+ years of comprehensive corporate experience forging strong and influential relationships with clients, Global teams, stakeholders and senior Global leadership to identity business requirements and merge country driven operations into centralized Global Service Delivery departments. Superb leadership abilities with strong expertise in the field of process improvement, implementation, standardization and synergy. Proven problem solving and analytical thinking skills, fast-learning curve and ability to adapt. 

A dedicated professional with the drive and skill-set to excel in a fast-paced multicultural environment.
